 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Join host and architect Stephen Chung as he profiles the most provocative and innovative public spaces in North America. Each hour long episode is organized around a central theme such as "Spaces for Art," "Sustainable and Green," and "Performance & Entertainment" and profiles three to four recently completed buildings. But Cool Spaces: The Best New Architecture is not just a show about buildings! Rather, the focus is on the diverse range of people that are connected together by a significant piece of architecture. Their stories will highlight the enormous human diversity behind the scenes of every building.
imdb.title: Cool Spaces: The Best New Architecture
akas: Cool Spaces: The Best New Architecture (United States)
plot: Join host and architect Stephen Chung as he profiles the most provocative and innovative public spaces in North America. Each hour long episode is organized around a central theme such as "Spaces for Art," "Sustainable and Green," and "Performance & Entertainment" and profiles three to four recently completed buildings. But _Cool Spaces: The Best New Architecture_ (qv) is not just a show about buildings! Rather, the focus is on the diverse range of people that are connected together by a significant piece of architecture. Their stories will highlight the enormous human diversity behind the scenes of every building.::Janson Media
